slogan: The multilothic JSON / INI / TOML / XML tool — Console and UI. Free your data, stay in control.
footer_gpl: Free software GPL v3 – 100% Open Source – Powered by K-Cim
intro: GridKeep lets you manipulate all your config files (JSON, INI, TOML, XML) via a powerful CLI and a modern GUI. Visualize sets, manage graphs, automate pipelines. Security, performance, extensibility.
